projects.title: Music Webpage
projects.description: Developed a responsive music Web page using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript, with Aceternity UI for a modern interface.

projects.title: Digital Clock
projects.description: Developed a responsive sleek and modern digital clock application displaying both digital and analog clock interfaces using React.js , JavaScript , Css and Scss.

projects.title: Gym Webpage
projects.description: Developed a responsive gym web page using React.js , Tailwind CSS , and JavaScript , with Animate On Scroll Library.

projects.title: Quote Machine
projects.description: A random quote machine that generates and displays motivational quotes to inspire users Developed in HTML , CSS and JavaScript.

projects.title: To-DO Application
projects.description: A dyanmic To-DO application built with React.js, Tailwind CSS, React-redux and JavaScript.

projects.title: Pizza Delivery Application
projects.description: A dyanmic pizza delivery application built with React.js, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript.
